title: Massive lag spikes the past few games
body: It's getting to the point where you should be ashamed of your servers. Hitting ms of over a thousand is embarrassing for a game of this popularity and size Riot and it's about time you stopped tipping money into boring champ designs and instead looked at the shoddy servers.

replies.body:
There's a number of things that could cause ping spikes.  If it was a one off thing and everyone within the game was experiencing the same lag, it's very well within the realm of possibility that there was an issue with that game server.  If it's something that's happening consistently or if other players in your game aren't experiencing the same type of lag, then I'd say it's more likely to be an issue with the connection between your individual network and our servers.

Best next step would be to use our [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) which should help to identify where/what the problems are as well as some steps for how to fix them.  Let me know if it helps!
